mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def word_frequency(string: str, m: int) -> dict:
    words = re.sub('', '', string)
    words = words.lower().split()
    words = [word for word in words if len(word) >= m]
    word_freq = dict(Counter(words))
    word_freq = {k: v for (k, v) in sorted(word_freq.items(), key=lambda item: item[1], reverse=True)}
    return word_freq

import re
from collections import Counter

def word_frequency(string: str, m: int) -> dict:
    words = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', string)
    words = words.lower().split()
    words = [word for word in words if len(word) >= m]
    word_freq = dict(Counter(words))
    word_freq = {k: v for (k, v) in sorted(word_freq.items(), key=lambda item: item[1], reverse=True)}
    return word_freq

mutants.original_line: words = [word for word in words if len(word) >= m]
mutants.mutated_line: words = [word for word in words if len(word) > m]

import re
from collections import Counter

def word_frequency(string: str, m: int) -> dict:
    words = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', string)
    words = words.lower().split()
    words = [word for word in words if len(word) >= m]
    word_freq = dict(Counter(words))
    word_freq = {k: v for (k, v) in sorted(word_freq.items(), key=lambda item: item[-1], reverse=True)}
    return word_freq
